column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: Loss of money Or financial issues

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: That it will lead to financial difficulties or cause emotional disruption

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: They make a decision that risks the life of a family member - change medication that isnt prescribed etc.

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: Signing agreements which are legal documents

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: That it causes significant personal or financial harm to anyone in my family which could result in e.g. loss of home or end up getting my child taken away from me for its mistake.

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: I am fearful that it could undermine or cause harm to the health and wellbeing of my family due to errors.

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: Giving advice or making a decision that has an actively negative impact on any of my family or my financial situation

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: Whether that decision harms a family member physically, emotionally or financially.

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: That it would potentially make the wrong decision and then in turn affect my family for the rest of our lives

column2: What is the single biggest risk or fear you have about an AI assistant making decisions for your family?
column3: It makes decisions where it may not know everything like if a child got a new allergy but then it recommends something which triggers the allergy and we forget to check. This could be serious. Also to make sure we know which is the company behind the AI and they do not have any hidden agendas with the data.

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: Being transparent about the data it holds, not misusing that data   and giving me full control over the data stored.

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: Guarantee the privacy of the data it stores about me and allowing me full control over how it's used.

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: Always ask permission before collecting any data about me.

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: its assurance of privacy to my data

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: Always confirm with me before arranging anything on my behalf.

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: Be transparent about how they use my data

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: Be transparent with how it stores and uses my data.

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: Be 100% transparent with my personal data

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: To be responsible with my privacy, to not use or share at all my data with anyone

column2: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
column3: Ensure that it cannot make any decisions on my behalf without my approval.  Also prove that the personal information it holds about me is truly secure.
